name: health
description: Start application and check if a window appears

name: create-stored-password
objective: Demonstrate the record of password by seahorse
description:
Open seahorse (Passwords and keys) and click on "+" (add a new key and item).
Select "stored password" and create a password record.
Check that the password is recorded
author: jb

name: handle-chrome-password
objective: Demonstrate the integration of chrome with gnome-keyring-daemon
description:
With chrome, connect to an internet site requiring authentication and tell to remember password.
Open seahorse (Passwords and keys) and check that exists an entry matching the url of the site and having the recorded password.
author: jb

name: create-ssh-key
objective: Demonstrate the handling of SSH by seahorse
description:
Open seahorse (Passwords and keys) and click on "+" (add a new key and item).
Select "Secure Shell Key" and create a SSH key.
Check that the key is recorded
author: jb

name: view-all
description:
Open seahorse (Passwords and keys).
Select "Show any" in "view" menu then check that certificates browsable.
author: jb
